title: 1999/767/EC: Commission Decision of 17 November 1999 repealing Decision 98/407/EC concerning certain protective measures with regard to bivalve molluscs and fishery products originating or proceeding from Turkey and amending the Decisions 94/777/EC and 94/778/EC (notified under document number C(1999) 3761) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 17 November 1999
repealing Decision 98/407/EC concerning certain protective measures with regard to bivalve molluscs and fishery products originating or proceeding from Turkey and amending the Decisions 94/777/EC and 94/778/EC
(notified under document number C(1999) 3761)
(Text with EEA relevance)
(1999/767/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex A to the present Decision replaces the Annex B to the Decision 94/777/EC.
The Annex B to the present Decision replaces the Annex C to the Decision 94/777/EC.
The Annex C to the present Decision replaces the Annex B to the Decision 94/778/EC.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 November 1999.
For the Commission
David BYRNE
Member of the Commission
